model-1.name: DistilBERT
model-1.info: This as DistilBERT model that is fine-tuned on Sentiment Analysis for Financial News dataset. The News is classified into 2 categories: **Positive**, **Negative**. [Sentiment Dataset](https://www.kaggle.com/ankurzing/sentiment-analysis-for-financial-news)

model-2.name: RoBERTa
model-2.info: This as RoBERTa model that is fine-tuned IMDB Reviews dataset. Reviews being classified into one of the 3 categories: **Positive**, **Negative** or **Neutral**. [IMDB Dataset](https://www.kaggle.com/lakshmi25npathi/imdb-dataset-of-50k-movie-reviews)

model-1.name: DistilBERT
model-1.info: This model is trained on News Aggregator Dataset from UC Irvin Machine Learning Repository. The news headlines are classified into 4 categories: **Business**, **Science and Technology**, **Entertainment**, **Health**. [New Dataset](https://archive.ics.uci.edu/ml/datasets/News+Aggregator)

model-1.name: spaCy
model-1.info: This is a pre-trained model availabe from spaCy python library. URL to the model details: [spaCy](https://spacy.io/models/en)

model-1.name: T5
model-1.info: This as T5-small model fine-tuned for summarization task. This model will only generate summaries if the text is greater than 150 words. [News Summary Dataset](https://www.kaggle.com/sunnysai12345/news-summary)
